There are three great movie theaters in Charlottesville.  Each of which is relatively unique from the others and all of which are worth visiting. But the Violet Crown is my favorite of the three. Any given year, you can catch blockbusters, indie movies, Oscar movies, documentaries, and older movies they decide to put back in theaters. I had one of my favorite movie theater experiences ever watching the 2017 Oscar Nominated Animated Short Films screening. One of the reasons being that the rest of the audience was so respectful of everyone else and yet clearly having a good time watching the show.
